review: Hands down this product is far more better than my Roku ever was!  After reading some reviews, in particular struggles with using the product on Wifi and also Netflix being slow, I was at first hesitant.  However, I found no issues in any of those areas.  Using Amazon Prime on my Roku became almost impossible as it kept buffering or not running at all, however had no issue with Netflix.  But moving to Amazon Fire TV, not only are all my programs running fast and smooth, I found additional programs that are not offered via Roku.
author: Anna DePinto
